title: Ticket #1121: Ship proper MPICH example scripts with Condor
description:
Condor does not include an MPICH2 parallel universe startup script in its packaging. This is a bummer, since it exists in /src/condor_scripts/mp2script. To further add confusion that needs to be cleaned up, our source code base has two (different) implementations of an MPICH1 startup script, one in /src/scripts/mp1script and another in /src/condor_examples/mp1script.

Our source code should have one place where these scripts live, and all (working) scripts should ship in the release package in etc/examples as per the Condor Manual.
